headline: Republic Services Charitable Foundation Announces 2025 National Neighborhood Promise速 Grants
summary: Republic Services, Inc. (NYSE: RSG) and the Republic Services Charitable Foundation today announced the 14 nonprofit organizations receiving 2025 grants through the Foundation's National Neighborhood Promise速 (NNP) Program. The NNP program works to revitalize communities and enhance the quality of life of residents through volunteer projects, monetary donations and in-kind services.

headline: Merion Road Capital Q1 2025 Investor Letter
summary: The MRCM Long Only portfolio increased 12.9% while the Small Cap rose 4.9% during the fisrt quarter of 2025. Click here to read the full letter.
